item.title: whats with Bunnytrack and reviews??
item.author: invalid@example.com (themastercorey)
item.dc:creator: themastercorey
item.content:encoded:
Bunnytracks doesn't seems to get any reviews anywere??
why's that?? I know there are alot of crappy bunnytracks out there but also still a few good ones. Why don't some reviewers with a bit of guts review those then. And don't you think nooby BT mappers out there need crits on there worse maps?? Atleast give it a try plz for BT sake

item.title: Sabbath Cat's extremew00t Mappack
item.author: invalid@example.com (difool2)
item.dc:creator: difool2
item.content:encoded:
Thought I'd start a discussion on this new mappack.

http://www.extremew00t.com/

Before the vets here start rolling their eyes and groaning, "Oh no not another
set of Woot ripoff maps!", I'll point out that these have merely been inspired by
the Woot concept, and in most cases take it to a new higher and better level.

Standouts for me (gotta go to work-spent all much lunch break trying these)
include:

Hall of Woot (inspired by Hall of Giants)...

Sabbath Cat's extremew00t Mappack

item.title: UT Top Map Choices
item.author: invalid@example.com (Nahand)
item.dc:creator: Nahand
item.content:encoded:
Like the title says, i figured people have a "list" of those maps that, in a way or another, they consider the best and/or just their fancy no matter the scores.

So, i thought why not everybody make a small list of their top 5 custom or so maps for each gametype prefix ? Well yes, it gives some work to do it, and yes it is a dumb idea (hey, it's the end of the year!), but why not share with the rest of the people what is YOUR personal best/most played maps for UT? Come on!...

UT Top Map Choices

item.title: DM-Goatswood discussion
item.author: invalid@example.com (Manticore)
item.dc:creator: Manticore
item.content:encoded:
I must admit the first time I played it I wasn't thinking adventure SP (although DM-Urotsukidoji has a lot of small finds in it; the movie projector etc).
I've been playing a lot of DM lately so when I hit that play button the mindset has been find it and kill it. It took me a little while (and some prompting from a not-so-anonymous prompter) to put it all in perspective....

The full blown adventure version runs pretty well on my rig with no lag. The addition of extra projectors for...

DM-Goatswood discussion

item.title: What happened to CTF-Tarjas?
item.author: invalid@example.com (difool2)
item.dc:creator: difool2
item.content:encoded:
For some odd reason this map got pulled today, whether by Nali City or the
mapmaker. I'm glad I dled it because it is a keeper, with tons of insane z-
axis action. Anyone know why it got pulled? I noted no flammatory comments
this morning when I penned by comment...

item.title: Whrong accusation?

Fliegenklatsche said:
06-14-2005 11:53 AM EDT Rating: 0
Another one who steals StaticMeshes, Textures from other maps!
The minimum what the mapper has been asked is if you may use them.

The result for me is that I never again will give any of my maps free for downloading on any map base.

In my opinion those people who adorn themselves with...

item.title: CBP2 CTF maps - do you like them?
item.author: invalid@example.com (scirmast)
item.dc:creator: scirmast
item.content:encoded:
Hi everyone. I haven't had any change to test these maps online, so I finally decided to try them with bots. I think they're much better than stock CTF maps (surprise), yet they're not played online.

I'd like to hear some comments about the playability of the maps, especially from serious CTFers. Are they any good, compared to, say, TheFlagPack maps?

item.content:encoded:
I'm looking for a map that is based on this other FPS called Requiem Avenging Angel, does any1 know the name?

Thanks in advance!

item.title: Unreal Academy
item.author: invalid@example.com (Master Roshi)
item.dc:creator: Master Roshi
item.content:encoded:
Unreal Academy Built by "Gary Myers"

This is a school setted map with almost all of the weapons with 2 warhead launchers one in the basement abuve the lava pit and the other..... Oh no i will not say you will have to find it for your self why spoil it. The lighting is deasent but the acale really needs work every thing is grosely over sized. !2 Ft doors and 15 Ft ceilings and hardly no details poor work on the steps. When he says 6-12 players he really means that you really shoold start...

Unreal Academy

item.title: The CTC (Community Tribute Classic) maps!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Homeslice)
item.dc:creator: Homeslice
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys, what do y'all think of Volume 1 of the CTC pack that was recently released by the boys of Unreal Playground (specifically: evil_blue_dude, Fritz-X, TexasGtar, L.J.Paranoid, Flying_Killer)?

I gotta say they're great pieces of work that prove to us all that UT has still got it! CTF-CTC-Helimania: Good concept here, and a bit small and hazardous to navigate on, but fun nonetheless, and visuals are good. DM-CTC-Croon: probably the best of the pack (despite its...

The CTC (Community Tribute Classic) maps!
